name: Portal Service
description:
Portal Service

Portal Service is a 2D Retro fast-faced Arcade/Casual game that takes place in 2024 where humans have developed a device that allows people to travel through portals.

The goal in this game is to catch as many people as you can using the portal before they hit the floor, and with the points earned you can unlock different skins.

INSTRUCTIONS
  • Catch people with your portal to save them!
  • Just tap and hold each side of the screen to move the portal side by side.
  • Do not let the people hit the floor, and make sure to catch them even if they bounce on the walls.
  • Unlock different skins with your score.
How many people can you save?
